name: SWOLE
description:
Needs Switch joycons to work - connect them as bluetooth devices.

Pump iron to get SWOLE. Strap your joycons to dumbbells and start working out, while we keep track of your reps for you.

Made for Slavic Game Jam 2019

Teammembers:

Szymon, Ola, Seba, Tomek, Mati, Olek, Łukasz
